name: Shoot And Punch Brawl
description:
Why The Web version So Lag???? At lease the Download version works fine.

it's a PvP local multiplayer game that use gun to shoot bullet that act like a dodgeball, it can bounce off wall, shoot it into the sky and  falling back down, and it can still do damage until it touch the ground. With 3 Character comes with different ability to play with. 

I'm a solo dev who start learn to make game last year, this is my 6th game but first few are CRAP, this is my first game i work over a month and really upload to itch.io, if you think is bad, buggy, boring ,hard , that's alright ,you can leave a comment , ill try to fix it and move on to next project, but if the game idea is good enough, maybe I'll go back and Finish it up.

I'm not a English speaker, so if my English suck ass,  sorry.

And if you want to play air hockey with bomb, maybe ill upload the game.
